chapters.title: Chapter 5: Writings
chapters.info: Jisao Hamora, p. 110—Former member of Gawyn's Younglings. He wore a silver Tower on his collar, the mark of a veteran fighter who saw the riots in the White Tower along with Gawyn. He was little more than a boy when the conflict started, but he is a seasoned veteran now. He has since been bonded as a Warder.
